entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:55 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -13.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 12:00 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -13.9°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -16.3°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
